sink.preCopyScript:
DELETE FROM HWAI_Benefits
WHERE BenefitType='b13c' and Year=YEAR(GETDATE( ));

body.value:
{
 "title":"PIPELINE RUN FOR Benefit_file_b13c_to_DB IS SUCCESS",
 "color":"GREEN",
 "message":"Benefit_file_b13c_to_DB completed sccessfully",
 "dataFactoryName":"@{pipeline().DataFactory}",
 "pipelineName":"@{pipeline().Pipeline}",
 "pipelineRunId":"@{pipeline().RunId}",
 "time":"@{utcnow()}"
}

activities.name: send email update for fail Benefit File b13c to db

body.value:
{
 "title":"PIPELINE RUN FOR Benefit_file_b13c_to_DB FAILED",
 "color":"RED",
 "message":"Debug the Benefit_file_b13c_to_DB and run the Pipeline again",
 "dataFactoryName":"@{pipeline().DataFactory}",
 "pipelineName":"@{pipeline().Pipeline}",
 "pipelineRunId":"@{pipeline().RunId}",
 "time":"@{utcnow()}"
}
